=======
History
=======

0.1.1 (27 July 2017)
--------------------

* Patched documentation to remove some leftovers from port over from
  `islex-core`.


0.1.0 (26 July 2016)
--------------------

* First git checkin of named-entity ISLE data, with configuration
  managed upstream.

* deployed with automatic push to pypi by travis.
